parameters.name: AltSvc
parameters.description:
Alt-Svc feature switch, default is disabled. Possible values:
- on: Enabled.
- off: Disabled.

parameters.name: AltSvcClear
parameters.description:
Whether the Alt-Svc header includes the clear parameter, default is disabled. Possible values:
- on: Enabled.
- off: Disabled.

parameters.name: AltSvcMa
parameters.description: Alt-Svc validity period in seconds, default is 86400 seconds.

parameters.name: AltSvcPersist
parameters.description:
Whether the Alt-Svc header includes the persist parameter, default is disabled. Possible values:
- on: Enabled.
- off: Disabled.

parameters.name: Hsts
parameters.description:
Whether to enable HSTS, default is disabled. Possible values:
- on: Enabled.
- off: Disabled.

parameters.name: HstsIncludeSubdomains
parameters.description:
Whether to include subdomains in HSTS, default is disabled. Possible values:
- on: Enabled.
- off: Disabled.

parameters.name: HstsPreload
parameters.description:
Whether to enable HSTS preload, default is disabled. Possible values:
- on: Enabled.
- off: Disabled.

parameters.name: HttpsForce
parameters.description:
Whether to enable forced HTTPS, default is disabled. Possible values:
- on: Enabled.
- off: Disabled.

parameters.name: HttpsForceCode
parameters.description:
Forced HTTPS redirect status code. Possible values:
- 301
- 302
- 307
- 308

parameters.name: Rule
parameters.description:
Rule content, using conditional expressions to match user requests. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration. There are two usage scenarios:
- Match all incoming requests: Set the value to true
- Match specific requests: Set the value to a custom expression, for example: (http.host eq \"video.example.com\")

parameters.name: RuleEnable
parameters.description:
Rule switch. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration. Possible values:
- on: Enabled.
- off: Disabled.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: Rule name. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~ListSites~~) interface.

parameters.name: SiteVersion
parameters.description: Version number of the site configuration. For sites with version management enabled, this parameter can specify the version to which the configuration applies, defaulting to version 0.
